edu.uw.cs.cse461.sp12.OS
Class RPCCallable.RPCCallableMethod<T>

java.lang.Object
  edu.uw.cs.cse461.sp12.OS.RPCCallable.RPCCallableMethod<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
Enclosing class:
RPCCallable
protected static class RPCCallable.RPCCallableMethod<T>
extends java.lang.Object

An object of this type represents an RPC callable method. You'll have one object of this type for each method exposed by RPC.

The parameterized type, T, is the class exposing the method.

See the source in EchoService.java for an example of its use.

Author:
zahorjan

Method Detail

handleCall

public org.json.JSONObject handleCall(org.json.JSONObject args)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
This method is called to actually invoke the method that handles the RPC.

Parameters:
args - The arguments to pass on this call
Returns:
The JSONObject returned by the RPC handling method of the service.
